# Introduction

<a name="head.Scope"></a>
## Scope

This document describes purpose and functionality of the org.rdk.PlaybackSync plugin. It includes detailed specification about its configuration, methods provided and notifications sent.

<a name="head.Description"></a>
# Description

The `PlaybackSync` plugin controls playback synchronization execution. It allows you to setup, join rooms for shared content playback synchronization like a watch party.

The plugin is designed to be loaded and executed within the Thunder framework. For more information about the framework refer to [[Thunder](#ref.Thunder)].

<a name="head.Configuration"></a>
# Configuration

The table below lists configuration options of the plugin.

| Name | Type | Description |
| :-------- | :-------- | :-------- |
| callsign | string | Plugin instance name (default: *org.rdk.PlaybackSync*) |
| classname | string | Class name: *org.rdk.PlaybackSync* |
| locator | string | Library name: *libWPEFrameworkPlaybackSync.so* |
| autostart | boolean | Determines if the plugin shall be started automatically along with the framework |
